reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major carotid disease categories: carotid atherosclerosis (~350 per 100k), carotid dissection (~1-3 per 100k), carotid stenosis (subset of atherosclerosis), fibromuscular dysplasia (~2 per 100k), other carotid pathology. Total aggregate ~450 per 100k. Heterogeneous umbrella term with significant overlap between categories and varying clinical significance.
